component.name: Chromium Browser for Nintendo Switch and L4T
component.summary: The Fastest and Most Feature Rich Browser for L4T

description.p: Chromium is an open-source browser project that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way to experience the web.
Includes hardware accelerated video decoding of H.264, VP8, and VP9. Vulkan backend for rendering and WebGL.
ChromeOS Widevine DRM included for services such as Spotify, Netflix, and Disney+. For some websites you may need to use the "Chromium Streaming" icon.
